original_text: But if God makes you really wise, you will live in a completely good way. That is the most important thing. Also, you will live in a way that brings peace. You will be kind to other people so that they become your friends. You will listen to them and not argue. You will forgive them and do many good things to help them. You will not choose between people. And you will not be a hypocrite.
korean_text: 오직 위로부터 난 지혜는 첫째 성결하고 다음에 화평하고 관용하고 양순하며 긍휼과 선한 열매가 가득하고 편견과 거짓이 없나니

sentences.original_text: But if God makes you really wise
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 하나님께서 당신을 진정으로 현명하게 만드신다면

sentences.original_text: you will live in a completely good way
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 완전히 선한 방식으로 살 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is the most important thing
Also, you will live in a way that brings peace
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 당신은 평화를 가져오는 방식으로 살 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will be kind to other people
so that they become your friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 당신의 친구가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and do many good things to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 돕기 위해 많은 좋은 일을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will not choose between people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 사람들 사이에서 선택하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And you will not be a hypocrite
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 위선자가 되지 않을 것입니다
